import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { UsuarioService } from './../../autenticacao/usuario/usuario.service'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cabecalho', templateUrl: './cabecalho.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cabecalho.component.css'] }) export class CabecalhoComponent implements OnInit { user$: any = this.usuarioService.retornaUsuario(); async: any; constructor(private usuarioService: UsuarioService, private router: Router) { } ngOnInit(): void { throw new Error('Method not implemented.'); } logout() { this.usuarioService.logout(); this.router.navigate(['']); } }
